title: Are there alligators in alligator creek, as you cross the first bridge on 74/76 going from wilmington into leland?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2017/05/are-there-alligators-in-alligator-creek-under-the-bridge-on-7476-between-wilmington-and-leland/
